## serialization.registry namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [register(name, serializer)](./blockly.serialization_namespace.registry_namespace.register_1_function.md) | Registers the given serializer so that it can be used for serialization and deserialization. |
|  [unregister(name)](./blockly.serialization_namespace.registry_namespace.unregister_1_function.md) | Unregisters the serializer associated with the given name. |
